Apply Curve Display Settings (Defaults)

The display settings for each curve, such as curve mnemonic, scale, pen type, pen color, name and measurement units, auto populate capabilities etc., can be saved as defaults.

These defaults can then be applied in a new ODF.

On the Curves tab, select Curve Settings. The Curve Settings sidebar will open.

Select the Curve, then Close the list. Note. The curve mnemonic must match that of the saved defaults or be a synonym of it.

Select Apply Defaults. Note. The Apply Defaults button will only enabled if a default has been saved for this mnemonic.

Note. The defaults are stored within the geocurve.ini file. The correct geocurve.ini file needs to be loaded in order for the saved defaults to be available.
